COMMAND.name: show ip route

PARAM.name: connected
PARAM.help: Connected routes (directly attached subnet or host)

COMMAND.name: show ip dhcp-relay
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${ifName}"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic_cli_if.py get_openconfig_relay_agent_relay_agent_dhcp_interfaces_interface_state show_ip_dhcp_relay_statistics.j2 ${ifName}
elif test -n "${brief}"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic_cli_if.py get_openconfig_relay_agent_relay_agent show_ip_dhcp_relay_brief.j2
elif test -n "${ifName1}"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic_cli_if.py get_openconfig_relay_agent_relay_agent_detail show_ip_dhcp_relay_detailed.j2 ${ifName1}
elif test -n "${detailed}"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic_cli_if.py get_openconfig_relay_agent_relay_agent_detail show_ip_dhcp_relay_detailed.j2
fi

CLISH_MODULE.VIEW:
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ipv4_addresses_address_config ${iface} ${addr}
sonic_cli_if delete_phy_if_ip ${iface} ${addr} True
oper=PATCH url=/restconf/data/openconfig-interfaces:interfaces/interface=${iface}/subinterfaces/subinterface=0/openconfig-if-ip:ipv4/unnumbered/interface-ref/config/interface body={"openconfig-if-ip:interface": "${donor-interface}"}
Configure IPv4 unnumbered interface by borrowing IPv4 address from the Donor interface.
Use this command to configure IPv4 unnumbered interface at the interface level.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip unnumbered Loopback1
oper=DELETE url=/restconf/data/openconfig-interfaces:interfaces/interface=${iface}/subinterfaces/subinterface=0/openconfig-if-ip:ipv4/unnumbered/interface-ref/config/interface
Unconfigure IPv4 unnumbered interface.
Use this command to unconfigure IPv4 unnumbered interface at the interface level.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip unnumbered Loopback1 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ip unnumbered
<COMMAND name="ip arp" <<<<<<< HEAD help="Configure static ND" command_tables="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/staticintf={name},staticip={addr}" dbpath="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/family=IPv4"> ||||||| merged common ancestors help="Configure static ND" > ======= help="Configure static ARP" > >>>>>>> origin/broadcom_sonic_3.x_share <PARAM name="static-ip" help="IP Address" <<<<<<< HEAD ptype="IPV4_OR_IPV6_ADDR" dbpath="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/staticip"/> ||||||| merged common ancestors ptype="IPV4_OR_IPV6_ADDR" /> ======= ptype="IP_ADDR" /> >>>>>>> origin/broadcom_sonic_3.x_share
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_static_arp_config ${iface} ${static-ip} ${neigh}
Configure static ARP.
Use this command to configure static ARP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# arp ip_addr mac
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_static_arp_config ${iface} ${static-ip} ${neigh}
Unconfigure static ARP.
Use this command to unconfigure static ARP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no arp ip_addr mac
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_enable_igmp ${iface} True
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_igmp_config ${iface} ${mcastgrpaddr} ${srcaddr}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp join mcastgrpaddr srcaddr
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_enable_igmp ${iface} False
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_igmp_config ${iface} ${mcastgrpaddr} ${srcaddr}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp join mcastgrpaddr srcaddr
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_igmp_version_config ${iface} ${version}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp join version number
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_igmp_version_config ${iface}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ip igmp version
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_igmp_queryinterval_config ${iface} ${queryinterval}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp query-interval interval
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_igmp_queryinterval_config ${iface}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ip igmp query-interval
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_igmp_lmquerycount_config ${iface} ${lmquerycount}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp last-member-query-count count
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_igmp_lmquerycount_config ${iface}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ip igmp last-member-query-count
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_igmp_lmqueryinterval_config ${iface} ${lmqueryinterval}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp last-member-query-interval interval
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_igmp_lmqueryinterval_config ${iface}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ip igmp last-member-query-interval
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_igmp_querymaxrestime_config ${iface} ${querymaxrestime}
Configure IGMP.
Use this command to configure IGMP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp query-max-response-time time
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_igmp_querymaxrestime_config ${iface}

sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ip igmp query-max-response-time

COMMAND.name: no ip address
COMMAND.help: Delete IPv4 address(es) on the interface

CLISH_MODULE.VIEW:
sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ipv4_addresses_address_config ${vlan_name} ${addr}
sonic_cli_if delete_vlan_if_ip ${vlan_name} ${addr} True
<COMMAND name="ip arp" <<<<<<< HEAD help="Configure static ND" command_tables="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/staticintf={name},staticip={addr}" dbpath="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/family=IPv4" > ||||||| merged common ancestors help="Configure static ND" > ======= help="Configure static ARP" > >>>>>>> origin/broadcom_sonic_3.x_share <PARAM name="static-ip" help="IP Address" <<<<<<< HEAD ptype="IPV4_OR_IPV6_ADDR" dbpath="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/staticip"/> ||||||| merged common ancestors ptype="IPV4_OR_IPV6_ADDR" /> ======= ptype="IP_ADDR" /> >>>>>>> origin/broadcom_sonic_3.x_share <PARAM name="neigh" help="MAC Address" <<<<<<< HEAD ptype="MAC_ADDR" dbpath="sonic-ip-neighbor:sonic-ip-neighbor/NEIGH/NEIGH_LIST/neigh" /> sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_static_arp_config ${iface} ${static-ip} ||||||| merged common ancestors ptype="MAC_ADDR" /> sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_static_arp_config ${iface} ${static-ip} ======= ptype="MAC_ADDR" /> sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_static_arp_config ${vlan_name} ${static-ip} >>>>>>> origin/broadcom_sonic_3.x_share ${neigh}
Configure static ARP.
Use this command to configure static ARP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# arp ip_addr mac
sonic_cli_if delete_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_static_arp_config ${vlan_name} ${static-ip} ${neigh}
Unconfigure static ARP.
Use this command to unconfigure static ARP.

Configure IGMP join.
Use this command to configure IGMP join.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ip igmp join mcastgrpaddr srcaddr

Remove IGMP join.

Use this command to remove IGMP version config.

sonic_cli_if patch_openconfig_if_ip_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ipv4_addresses_address_config ${po_name} ${addr}
sonic_cli_if delete_po_if_ip ${po_name} ${addr} True
oper=PATCH url=/restconf/data/openconfig-interfaces:interfaces/interface=${po_name}/subinterfaces/subinterface=0/openconfig-if-ip:ipv4/unnumbered/interface-ref/config/interface body={"openconfig-if-ip:interface": "${donor-interface}"}
Configure IPv4 unnumbered interface by borrowing IPv4 address from the Donor interface.
Use this command to configure IPv4 unnumbered interface at the interface level.
sonic-cli(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic-cli(conf-if-po1)# ip unnumbered Loopback1
oper=DELETE url=/restconf/data/openconfig-interfaces:interfaces/interface=${po_name}/subinterfaces/subinterface=0/openconfig-if-ip:ipv4/unnumbered/interface-ref/config/interface
Unconfigure IPv4 unnumbered interface.
Use this command to unconfigure IPv4 unnumbered interface at the interface level.
sonic-cli(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic-cli(conf-if-po1)# ip unnumbered Loopback1 sonic-cli(conf-if-po1)# no ip unnumbered

Use this command to configure static ARP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# arp ip_addr mac

Unconfigure static ARP.
Use this command to unconfigure static ARP.
sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no arp ip_addr mac

PARAM.name: addr
PARAM.help: IP address with mask (/32 is supported)

COMMAND.name: no ip address
COMMAND.help: Delete IPv4 address(es) on the interface
